response.overview: ORBITOR weaves a poetic narrative revolving around the 1966 Lunar Orbiter mission, narrated and infused with interviews of the artist's grandparents, recalling their fragmented memories of that same year. The layering of narrative and the ambient hum of a radio crash, disrupt, and interfere with each other, revealing a haunting blurred portrait of Thailand in the Cold War era, oscillating between personal memory and geopolitical histories.
response.tagline: blurred portrait of Thailand in the Cold War era, oscillating between personal memory and geopolitical histories
response.title: ORBITOR
